Section.Text: 2013, c. 40, s. 363(3); 2014, c. 20, s. 313 (direct payments), c. 33 (FINANCE), Vote No. 8b

Section.Label: 397 to 399
Section.Text: repealed, 2018, c. 27, s. 432 (Note: s. 399 repealed before coming into force)

General.Text: General, 2009, c. 2, ss. 295, 296, 300 to 308, 309 as amended by 2009, c. 31, s. 24(1), 310 to 316 and 392 re payments

Item.Text: — s. 394 enacting the Public Sector Equitable Compensation Act, comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 406 — Not in force [s. 394, repealed before coming into force see 2018, c. 27, s. 429 — Not in force]
— s. 395, repealed, see 2018, c. 27, s. 430 — Not in force
— s. 396, repealed, see 2018, c. 27, s. 431(4) — Not in force
— ss. 397 and 398, repealed, see 2018, c. 27, s. 432 — Not in force
— s. 399 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2024 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3 (Statutes Repeal Act), see also Canada Gazette, Part I, Vol. 159, No. 25, p. 1248
— ss. 400 and 405 repealed before coming into force see 2013, c. 40, par. 469(2)(a) and (9)(a)

— ss. 401 to 404 come into force on a day to be fixed by Order of the Governor in Council see s. 406 — Not in force; [Note: s. 404, amended before coming into force see 2013, c. 40, s. 469(6) — Not in force; ss. 401 to 404 repealed before coming into force see 2018, c. 27, s. 433 — Not in force]
— s. 406, repealed, see 2018, c. 27, s. 434 — Not in force
— Parts 14 (ss. 466 and 468) and 15 (ss. 469 to 471) repealed before coming into force see 2018, c. 10, s. 91

CIF.Text: CIF, 2009, c. 31 (assent: 15.12.2009), s. 24(1) deemed to have come into force 12.03.2009 see s. 24(2)
CIF, 2013, c. 40, s. 469 in force on assent 12.12.2013 [Note: s. 469(6) was amended see 2014, c. 39, s. 385]
CIF, 2014, c. 20, s. 313 in force on assent 19.06.2014
CIF, 2014, c. 33 (finance), Vote 8b in force on assent 16.12.2014
CIF, 2014, c. 39, s. 385 deemed in force on assent 12.12.2013 see s. 386
CIF, 2017, c. 9, s. 66 in force on assent 19.06.2017

CIF, 2018, c. 27 (assent: 13.12.2018), ss. 429, 430, 431(1) to (4) and 432 to 434 come into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 440(3) — Not in force (Note: s. 432 initially repealed ss. 397 to 399; s. 399 repealed before coming into force see 2008, c. 20, s. 3 (Statutes Repeal Act) see also Canada Gazette, Part I, Vol. 159, No. 25, p. 1248)
